title: League of Legends will not Open (i have checked other places, couldnt find an answer)
body: When i try to run the game it will bring up the logo as normal, then it will proceed to turn white and produce the error message asking if i should close the program, wait for it to respond, or try to restore it, but as i try to click something it disappears but the logo stays. I  was mid game when the game just completely crashed on me too {{item:3070}} would love help if possible.

replies.body: It sounds like your pc is having some troubles launching League whatsoever. That blank white screen typically means the program critically failed while launching, and Windows isn't sure why. At this point, I'd try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a reinstall/clean uninstall to make sure you've got a clean install of the game first.
